name: Conqueror's Blade: Season X - Highlanders
storyline: As the mighty Kingdom of Loegria encroaches on the boundaries of the Highlands to the north, the bitter rivalries between the Highlands’ clans must be put aside to fight for the greater good and end a centuries-long conflict in the thrilling new Seasonal Campaign. Begin your journey in the Conqueror's City in the heart of the Borderlands, then venture out to complete new Stages, hone your forces alongside your House in twice-weekly Territory Wars, and prepare for a final showdown at Turul Város at the end of Season X!
summary: Battle for the heart and soul of the Highlands in Season X: Highlanders, based on the rich history and legends of Scotland. Season X features three unlockable Highlander units with several new mechanics, a siege map based on the lush green valleys of Scotland, treasure to be earned from the Battle Pass, and so much more.
